attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://www.aylesburyunitedfc.co.uk/news.php?story=935

"As Aylesbury United Football Club approach their 110th season, the Club have launched a campaign to 'Bring The Ducks Home' and highlight their current homeless plight.

The Ducks currently play their 'home' games at Chesham United's ground, but need to return to Aylesbury as soon as possible to be financially viable and easily accessible to its current fans and for a future generation of supporters.

The Club also needs a base to support its Youth development, Reserves and Ladies section.

The intention is to obtain as much exposure as possible through the many media outlets to place pressure on the local authorities to help find a new home for the Ducks."

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
